item.title: 哥伦比亚大胆推动绿色发展的意外代价：天然气进口
item.description:
安第斯国家必须引进碳足迹更大的货物，因为其自身的储量正在减少，而且其总统拒绝允许签订新的钻探合同。【原文：

The Andean nation must bring in cargoes with a bigger carbon footprint as its own reserves dwindle and its president refuses to allow new drilling contracts.

】

item.title: 为什么人工智能投资者应该担心自动驾驶汽车撞车？
item.description:
机器人出租车本应是自动化中最容易实现的部分。通用汽车的失败表明，该行业距离实现其狂野的承诺还有多远。【原文：

Robotaxis were supposed to be the easy part of automation. The failure of GM’s effort shows how far the industry is from living up to its wild promises.

】

item.title: OpenAI 在向新华盛顿推销时强调与中国的竞争
item.description:
这家初创公司的高层管理人员计划在华盛顿特区和至少两个关键的摇摆州举办聚会，以加强对人工智能投资的支持。【原文：

The startup’s top execs plan to host gatherings in DC and at least two key swing states to bolster support for AI investment.

】

item.title: 奥地利极右翼计划削减预算开支以避免欧盟处罚
item.description: 奥地利谈判代表试图组建一个民族主义保守派政府，他们的目标是立即削减 63 亿欧元（64 亿美元）的预算开支，以避免受到欧盟的指责。【原文：Austrian negotiators trying to form a nationalist-conservative government will target €6.3 billion ($6.4 billion) in immediate budget spending cuts to avoid being reprimanded by the European Union.】

item.title: 就业数据公布后，国债大跌波及全球市场
item.description: 本周伊始，由于交易员们在周五的美国就业报告公布后缩减了对美联储降息的押注，国债开始走弱。【原文：Treasuries started the week on the backfoot as traders scaled back bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts following Friday’s blowout US employment report.】

item.title: 印度周五拒绝接受被美国制裁的油轮
item.description: 印度将拒绝美国制裁的油轮，因为这些油轮为俄罗斯运送货物，这是华盛顿的措施对全球石油市场造成影响的又一个例子。【原文：India is set to reject oil tankers sanctioned by the US for their role in moving cargoes for Russia, another example of impact that Washington’s measures are having on the global oil market.】

item.title: 苹果在英国审判中面临 "暴利 "指控
item.description: 在英国首次针对大型科技公司的集体诉讼审判中，苹果公司将就其利用 App Store 滥用市场支配地位赚取 "暴利 "的指控进行辩护。【原文：Apple Inc. will defend allegations that it made “exorbitant profits” by using its App Store to abuse its dominant market position at the first UK class action trial against a Big Tech firm.】

item.title: 印度通胀缓解，卢比暴跌削弱降息希望
item.description: 印度上个月的通胀有所缓解，但货币暴跌可能会让央行有理由推迟降息。【原文：India’s inflation eased last month, but a plunging currency may give the central bank reason to delay cutting interest rates just yet.】

item.title: 基础设施基金曼萨看好非洲投资机会
item.description: 总部设在非洲的基础设施开发和投资公司 Mansa Infrastructure Partners 正在寻求在 2025 年筹集 3 亿美元，用于非洲大陆的基础设施投资。【原文：Mansa Infrastructure Partners, an Africa-based infrastructure development and investment company, is seeking to raise $300 million in 2025 for infrastructure investments across the continent.】

item.title: 西欧各地的冰冻天气将推高供暖需求
item.description: 西欧各地的冰冻气温将推动本周的供暖需求上升，天气前景将比之前的预测更加寒冷。【原文：Freezing temperatures across western Europe will drive up heating demand this week, with the weather outlook turning colder than previous forecasts.】

item.title: 印度政府在抗议声中推进电力私有化
item.description: 印度人口最多的北方邦（Uttar Pradesh）正在推进其备受争议的计划，将部分电力公司私有化，以确保在需求不断增长的情况下可靠供电。【原文：India’s most populous state Uttar Pradesh is going ahead with its controversial plan to privatize some of its power utilities in an effort to ensure reliable supply amid rising demand.】

item.title: 银信即将与包括阿布扎比在内的投资者达成 10 亿美元融资协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，马来西亚能源基础设施公司银信控股有限公司（Yinson Holdings Bhd.【原文：Malaysian energy infrastructure firm Yinson Holdings Bhd. is close to signing up investors for a funding round in its unit that makes equipment used by the offshore oil and gas industry, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊认为美元走强将导致利润大幅缩水
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的策略师认为，美元反弹很可能会导致本季度美国企业的盈利记分卡出现重大分化，以国内为导向的行业将超越那些拥有大量国际收入的行业。【原文：A rallying dollar is likely to drive a big divide in Corporate America’s earnings scorecard this season, with domestically oriented sectors outshining those with large international revenues, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 特斯拉全球汽车销量首次超过奥迪
item.description: 尽管特斯拉公司的汽车销量低于预期，但该公司去年仍超越了德国最受欢迎的高端汽车品牌之一。【原文：Tesla Inc. overtook one of Germany’s most prized premium car brands last year despite selling fewer vehicles than expected.】

item.title: 英国市场再度下跌，投资者在通胀前惶惶不安
item.description: 本周英国将公布一份关键的通胀报告，市场对该报告的忧虑可能会扩大英国市场的跌势，因此英国资产周一再次下滑。【原文：UK assets slumped again on Monday as angst ahead of a key inflation report this week threatens to extend a selloff in the nation’s markets.】

item.title: 指导意见缓解对美国的担忧后，Entain 创 10 月以来最大涨幅
item.description: Ladbrokes 旗下博彩公司 Entain Plc 的股价创下了 10 月份以来的最大涨幅，原因是该公司围绕 2024 年的指导目标发布的信息有所改善，从而缓解了人们对第四季度美国客户友好型业绩将侵蚀公司底线的担忧。【原文：Shares in Entain Plc, the gambling company that owns Ladbrokes, rose the most since October after improving its messaging around 2024 guidance, easing concerns that customer-friendly results in the US during the fourth quarter would eat into its bottom line.】

item.title: 印度央行称将通过外汇掉期缓解卢比荒
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度央行正在利用美元兑卢比掉期交易来缓解该国金融系统的流动性紧张状况。【原文：India’s central bank is using dollar-rupee swaps to ease a liquidity squeeze in the country’s financial system, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行不太可能加快降息步伐：Vujcic 致 Econostream
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）告诉 Econostream Media，欧洲中央银行可能不会加快降息步伐。【原文：The European Central Bank probably won’t accelerate its interest-rate reductions, Governing Council member Boris Vujcic told Econostream Media.】

item.title: 印度银行寻求十多年来首笔美元贷款
item.description: 印度银行自 2012 年以来首次推出高达 4 亿美元的美元银团贷款，熟悉内情的人士称，目前越来越多的印度借款人正在利用全球信贷市场。【原文：Bank of India is marketing its first dollar syndicated loan since 2012 of as much as $400 million, people familiar with the matter said, at a time when more Indian borrowers are tapping global credit markets.】

item.title: 降息暂停，捷克通胀加速低于预期
item.description: 捷克上月通胀加速，一年来首次达到央行容忍范围的上限，决策者正在权衡是否恢复货币宽松政策。【原文：Czech inflation accelerated last month, reaching the upper limit of the central bank’s tolerance range for the first time in a year as policymakers weigh whether to resume monetary easing.】

item.title: 欧洲股市因收益率压力和科技股下跌而下跌
item.description: 欧洲股市周一下跌，原因是债券收益率上升加剧了人们对股市估值的担忧，而科技股表现不佳。【原文：European stocks fell on Monday as rising bond yields stoked concerns over equity market valuations, while technology shares underperformed.】

item.title: PUBG》开发商计划大肆挥霍以寻求更多点击率
item.description: 热门游戏《PUBG: Battlegrounds》的开发商 Krafton Inc. 计划今年斥资超过 2000 亿韩元（1.36 亿美元），投资十多家有前途的游戏工作室，彰显其成为全球出版业巨头的雄心。【原文：Krafton Inc., the developer of hit title PUBG: Battlegrounds, plans to spend more than 200 billion won ($136 million) this year to invest in over a dozen promising game studios, underscoring its ambition to become a global force in publishing.】

item.title: SC Lowy 在私人信贷业务中裁减亚洲信贷人员
item.description: 据信贷投资者 SC Lowy Financial HK Ltd. 首席执行官称，该公司已裁员数人，因为该公司正从公共证券交易转向私人信贷。【原文：Credit investor SC Lowy Financial HK Ltd. has laid off several staff members, according to the company’s chief executive officer, as the firm pivots away from trading public securities and toward private credit.】

item.title: 法国天然气和电力公司 Engie 寻求进入沙特和阿联酋的可再生能源市场
item.description: 法国公用事业公司 Engie SA 正寻求在沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国的可再生能源市场站稳脚跟，这两个国家正在举行大规模的风能和太阳能发电场招标，以实现能源多样化。【原文：French utility Engie SA is seeking to gain foothold in renewable energy markets in Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates, which are holding big tenders for wind and solar farms to diversify their energy sources.】

item.title: 硫酸镍期货在新加坡上市，以满足日益增长的需求
item.description: 新加坡 Abaxx 交易所推出了硫酸镍期货合约，以满足对电池成分日益增长的需求，并解决不同类型金属之间的价格差异。【原文：A nickel sulphate futures contract has been launched by Abaxx Exchange in Singapore to meet growing demand for battery ingredients and address price divergence between types of the metal.】

item.title: Northvolt 向 Norsk Hydro 出售回收合资公司剩余股份
item.description: 破产电池制造商 Northvolt AB 同意将其在一家回收企业中的剩余股份出售给 Norsk Hydro ASA，以继续在美国破产保护程序中缩减业务。【原文：Bankrupt battery maker Northvolt AB agreed to sell its remaining shares in a recycling venture to Norsk Hydro ASA as it continues to slim down operations amid a Chapter 11 process in the US.】

item.title: 雷恩称，无论美联储如何行动，欧洲央行都需要更多降息措施
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，无论美国联邦储备委员会采取何种措施，欧洲央行都应继续降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank should continue lowering borrowing costs irrespective of what the US Federal Reserve does, according to Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】
